text: Theo Sommer (10 June 1930 â€“ 22 August 2022) was a German newspaper editor and academic. He worked for Die Zeit, beginning in 1958, becoming an editor-in- chief and publisher. Sommer died on 22 August 2022, at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths Category:German academics Category:German editors Category:German journalists
